```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## R Markdown
This is data from every bridge in Illinois(To get data on every bridge in the US, you had to have a zip file which couldn't be uploaded to Github). For information on what each column represents, please go to https://www.fhwa.dot.gov/bridge/mtguide.pdf.

Link To GitHub: https://github.com/kevinkevink/Stat433/blob/main/HW2/README.html


```{r loadData, echo=FALSE}
  bridgeData = read_delim("https://www.fhwa.dot.gov/bridge/nbi/2020/delimited/IL20.txt", col_names=TRUE)
  str(bridgeData)
  plot(bridgeData$STRUCTURE_NUMBER_008, bridgeData$COUNTY_CODE_003)
```
